title: How to sell second hand books - Quora

response.answer_text: Hey!! It's nice to hear that you are looking forward to selling your second hand books . It is a really humble and wise as it always helps others who cannot afford costly books and also contributes to saving the environment. You can sell your second hand books at a lot of places and make a difference. However, I have come across an online platform that might be helpful to you in doing this task. The name of this website is mypustak. Mypustak accepts second-hand books from donors and provides them to their customers at FREE OF COST. You just have to visit the website fill a form and after that, the team will schedule a pickup from your doorstep. Donate your second-hand books so that somebody else can benefit from it. Check mypustak so that you can use it to act as a channel through which your knowledge can be shared with others.

Hello, You can sell your books to your friends and other students and readers who want to buy used books at a cheap rate . Many bookstores buy secondhand books so you can sell your books to them because they want secondhand books and then sell them to other people at a higher profit, this is their business. You can earn more profit in this but if you want to donate your books for needy students and readers then check out this website MYPUSTAK .com . Mypustak will provide you a platform where you can donate your books to others needful students.  You can also get donated books from mypustak for FREE . Happy Learning ,
